last_episode_to_air.name: Opening Bars, Closing Chapters
last_episode_to_air.overview: The group celebrates the opening of Jax and Brittany's new bar; Janet comes face to face with Zack for the first time since her babymoon; the truth about Jax and Brittany's and Michelle and Jesse's marriages is revealed.

name: The Valley
overview: One day they are living the glam party life at SUR with Lisa Vanderpump and the next they're married and dealing with homeownership and children. From bottle service to baby bottles, close friends and reality stars find their way out of the young and fast life of the Hollywood lights. They are getting ready to grow up and have moved to the serenity of The Valley, where they navigate bustling businesses, rocky relationships and feisty friendships.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Valley
episodes.overview: “Vanderpump Rules” alums Jax, Brittany and Kristen have all traded in their wild nights at SUR for a suburban life in the Valley. In the series premiere, their couple-friends Danny and Nia are trying to juggle three kids under 2 years old. Jesse and Michelle are navigating the complicated world of being both toddler parents and business partners. When Brittany goes all out, throwing a lavish birthday party for best friend Janet, things take a turn for the worse when the group focuses less on the festivities and begin judging Kristen’s life-altering decisions.

episodes.name: Tit for Tat
episodes.overview: In the aftermath of Janet’s birthday party, Nia is angry about Jax pantsing her husband, Danny, in front of the group. Jesse finds himself in hot water with Kristen and Luke over an inappropriate action. Jax’s guy’s night comes crashing down when he invites a surprise visitor who blindsides Luke. While across town, Kristen unleashes an accusation against Michelle that could ruin their friendship forever.

episodes.name: Doubting Doute
episodes.overview: While everyone turns against Kristen for the accusations she hurled at Michelle during Girl’s Night, Brittany tries to help her understand the impact of her actions. Jax interviews bartenders for his new bar. Jesse and Michelle discover how fractured their relationship really is during their first marital counseling session. Janet and Jason stress about not feeling prepared for their new baby. A lavish Capri-themed dinner party is brought to a halt when Kristen is forced to relive one of the most difficult moments of her life.

episodes.name: Capri Chaos
episodes.overview: Jesse and Michelle deal with the aftermath of their Capri-themed dinner party, leaving the group on shaky ground with Kristen. Brittany opens up to Jax about their lack of intimacy. Luke plans a special date for Kristen with the help of Danny and Brittany. Janet invites the group to a charity gala where Zack tries to get Kristen, Jesse and Michelle to squash the beef between them.

episodes.name: The 'D' Word
episodes.overview: The ladies retreat to Malibu for a girls’ night while leaving the boys to daddy daycare. Michelle opens up to Brittany that she isn’t sure she wants to stay with Jesse. Brittany shares that she isn’t getting any intimacy from Jax. The ladies are concerned for Nia as she struggles with postpartum depression. The old Jax returns as he stirs up some interesting rumors about one friend in the group.

episodes.name: Congrats on Your Hair Loss
episodes.overview: Jax tries to get Jasmine to do his dirty work and find out if rumors about Michelle are true. Kristen begins to worry after a negative pregnancy test if she’ll ever have a baby. Brittany sees the progress at the bar for the first time after feeling excluded. Luke begins to feel homesick. The group gathers for the launch of a hair-loss product Jax is endorsing as long-simmering tensions come to an explosive head.

episodes.name: The #1 Gossip of the Group
episodes.overview: Janet and Jason confront Jax about cheating rumors. Luke begins to realize that dating Kristen isn’t as easy as he thought. Nia continues to struggle with postpartum blues while Brittany and Jax fail to get their mojo back. Kristen is labeled public enemy #1 after an explosive fight at the Mondrian.

episodes.name: The Invite Fight
episodes.overview: Brittany and Jax's struggles continue; Janet and Jason host a dinner party at their house and invite everyone except Kristen and Luke, further pushing a rift in the group; Jasmine tries to get to the bottom of who started the rumors about Michelle.

episodes.name: The Big Bear Bombshell
episodes.overview: Jesse returns from his spiritual retreat; Kristen, Luke and Zack are left behind as the group heads to Big Bear; Jax finally confronts Michelle about the infidelity rumors.

episodes.name: Babymoon Mayhem
episodes.overview: Jesse finally learns about the rumors swirling about his wife, Michelle; The guys come together to support Danny, who is feeling the mounting pressures of fatherhood.

episodes.name: Darkside Danny
episodes.overview: The women throw a surprise baby shower for Janet; The whole group indulges in a dinner for the final night in Big Bear dressed as their partner's fantasy.

episodes.name: Opening Bars, Closing Chapters
episodes.overview: The group celebrates the opening of Jax and Brittany's new bar; Janet comes face to face with Zack for the first time since her babymoon; the truth about Jax and Brittany's and Michelle and Jesse's marriages is revealed.
